content: I'm thinking of making a few other dishes to go along with the pumpkin pie, and I was wondering if you have any suggestions for some classic fall side dishes that pair well with the flavors of pumpkin and turkey. By the way, I'm still recovering from a sunburn I got during my beach trip last month, so I'm trying to avoid spending too much time in the kitchen. Do you have any suggestions for side dishes that are quick and easy to prepare?
